text: Kananjalo phakathi kwabantu kukho lowo unqula uAllâh emngciphekweni. Ukuba uthe wachukunyiswa kokulungileyo, uyaqiniseka (ukuMthemba uAllâh) kodwa athi esakufunyanwa yintshutshiso, bujike ubuso bakhe (ayilahle i-Islam). Yena ulahlekelwe kweli hlabathi nakuBomi oBuzayo. Oko ke yiyona lahleko icacileyo
